input: Initiate a batch request to retrieve all details for borrower change requests with UUIDs aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee and bbbbbbbb-cccc-dddd-eeee-ffffffffffff, ensuring to include all fields.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests/aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-eeeeeeeeeeee?$select=UUID,ID,LoanContractUUID,ChangeStateID,LifeCycleStatusCode,LifeCycleStatusName,ReasonCode,ReasonName,BusinessProcessChainAssignment,NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements,FormerBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements,NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID,ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator,CompletionDate,Activities HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequests/bbbbbbbb-cccc-dddd-eeee-ffffffffffff?$select=UUID,ID,LoanContractUUID,ChangeStateID,LifeCycleStatusCode,LifeCycleStatusName,ReasonCode,ReasonName,BusinessProcessChainAssignment,NewBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements,FormerBorrowerPartyIdentifyingElements,NewClearingBankAccountContractUUID,ChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator,CompletionDate,Activities HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
